item.title: [GRA3][Cooling System] - Rack GRA0315A04B maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 10, 07:00 - 15:00 UTC

Nov 12, 15:41 UTC
Update - This maintenance has been re-scheduled.
Below you can find the new information regarding this operation.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our cooling infrastructure.

Start time : 10/12/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 10/12/2025 15:00 UTC
Service impact : During this maintenance, the cooling system's efficiency may be temporarily reduced for some servers, potentially lowering performance.
Despite ongoing mitigation efforts, customers could still experience a temporary reboot or shutdown in the worst case.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [DEN][Network] - Backbone maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 2, 23:30 UTC  -  Dec 3, 01:30 UTC

Nov 10, 16:03 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our backbone infrastructure.

Start time : 02/12/2025 23:30 UTC
End time : 03/12/2025 01:30 UTC
Service impact : During this maintenance window, connectivity to the US-WEST-LZ-DEN Local Zone will be temporarily unavailable.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our teams will be doing a maintenance on multiple network equipment on DEN.

Thank you for your understanding.
